item.description:
Due to the 4th of July holiday, we're moving the meeting from the first Monday of the month to the second Monday of the month.

We hold our monthly business meeting this month at Panera Bread in Needham. Come and hear what the club is planning! The board members who can answer any questions you may have will be here. All members and prospective members are encouraged to attend. By actively participating in planning upcoming events, the more fun you'll be generating in upcoming weeks & months. [url=http://www.panerabread.com/cafes/find.php]More info on Panera Bread locations[/url]
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the biggest table in the place.
item.name: BBTC Business Meeting
